page.title: 15VILLAGE HALL, WESTWOODSIDE
page.content: Situated on Nethergate, the {Village Hall}was opened in 1953. The hall comprises of two rooms with stage and kitchen areas. Toilet and an outside wooden store complete the facilities. The hall is in continual use by local organisations which include playgroup, toddlers, youth club, dance club, Over 60's club, W.I., Show Society and Playing Fields Association. An Autumn Show of produce takes place in September in which local people exhibit their vegetables, flowers, baking and rabbits.
